issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Use Arc<> instead of Box<> in LogicalPlan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9900](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9900). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The idea is to continue to simplify the code and improve performance: the inputs to nodes are often copied and using Box requires unnecessary deep copies
